Question: Shenzhen Yanxing Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Yanxing Science & Technology Co.,Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Smart home fitness products focusing on cardio and strength training devices
- Developing big smart home equipment such as smart rowing machine and smart home gym machine, to be released in Q4 2023
- 3 professional R&D teams with 70+ experienced engineers
- 2 production bases with a total area of 13000㎡ in Guangdong, and building a 3rd factory with 50000㎡ in Hunan province
- OEM & ODM cooperation with customers
- Emphasis on technology to improve product performance and quality of life
- Providing high-quality products and services for the health of families worldwide
- Home Fitness Accessories, Home Strength Training, Home Cardio Training, and OEM ODM Solutions
